alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 24 at 8:24PM CDT until May 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Neosho River near Commerce. * WHEN...From this evening to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, low lying areas along the river in Riverview Park are threatened by high water and faster flows are expected. Use extra caution or avoid recreational activities near the river. Interests near the river should continue to monitor later forecasts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.4 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
